details:
Case 224 is a 50 year-old male Singapore Citizen, who had been in Malaysia from 1 March to 4 March. He was confirmed to have COVID-19 infection on 15 March morning, and is currently warded in an isolation room at NCID. He is a contact of Case 117Â and is linked to the cluster involving the private dinner function at SAFRA Jurong.

As he had been identified as a contact of Case 117, he was placed under quarantine since 5 March. He reported onset of symptoms on 13 March and was conveyed by ambulance to NCID on 14 March.

He stays at Senja Road.
